data.textUthmani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
data.wordByWord: وَكَمْ [And how many] أَهْلَكْنَا [We destroyed] قَبْلَهُم [before them] مِّن [of] قَرْنٍ [a generation] هُمْ [they] أَشَدُّ [(were) stronger] مِنْهُم [than them] بَطْشًۭا [(in) power] فَنَقَّبُوا۟ [so they explored] فِى [throughout] ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ [the lands] هَلْ [Is (there)] مِن [any] مَّحِيصٍ [place of escape]
data.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin humashaddu minhum batshan fanaqqaboo fee albiladi halmin mahees

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] فِى [in] ذَٰلِكَ [that] لَذِكْرَىٰ [surely, is a reminder] لِمَن [for (one) who] كَانَ [is ] لَهُۥ [for him] قَلْبٌ [a heart] أَوْ [or] أَلْقَى [(who) gives ear] ٱلسَّمْعَ [(who) gives ear] وَهُوَ [while he] شَهِيدٌۭ [(is) a witness]
data.transliteration: Inna fee thalika lathikraliman kana lahu qalbun aw alqa assamAAawahuwa shaheed

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And certainly] خَلَقْنَا [We created] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضَ [and the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَا [(is) between both of them] فِى [in] سِتَّةِ [six] أَيَّامٍۢ [periods] وَمَا [and (did) not] مَسَّنَا [touch Us] مِن [any] لُّغُوبٍۢ [fatigue]
data.transliteration: Walaqad khalaqna assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma fee sittatiayyamin wama massana min lughoob

data.textUthmani: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
data.wordByWord: فَٱصْبِرْ [So be patient] عَلَىٰ [over] مَا [what] يَقُولُونَ [they say] وَسَبِّحْ [and glorify] بِحَمْدِ [(the) praise] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] قَبْلَ [before] طُلُوعِ [(the) rising] ٱلشَّمْسِ [(of) the sun] وَقَبْلَ [and before] ٱلْغُرُوبِ [the setting]
data.transliteration: Fasbir AAala mayaqooloona wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulooAAiashshamsi waqabla alghuroob

data.wordByWord: وَمِنَ [And of] ٱلَّيْلِ [the night] فَسَبِّحْهُ [glorify Him] وَأَدْبَـٰرَ [and after] ٱلسُّجُودِ [the prostration]

data.textUthmani: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
data.wordByWord: وَٱسْتَمِعْ [And listen] يَوْمَ [(The) Day] يُنَادِ [will call] ٱلْمُنَادِ [the caller] مِن [from] مَّكَانٍۢ [a place] قَرِيبٍۢ [near]
data.transliteration: WastamiAA yawma yunadi almunadimin makanin qareeb

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] يَسْمَعُونَ [they will hear] ٱلصَّيْحَةَ [the Blast] بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ [in truth] ذَٰلِكَ [That] يَوْمُ [(is the) Day] ٱلْخُرُوجِ [(of) coming forth]
data.transliteration: Yawma yasmaAAoona assayhatabilhaqqi thalika yawmu alkhurooj

data.textUthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّا [Indeed, We] نَحْنُ [[We]] نُحْىِۦ [[We] give life] وَنُمِيتُ [and [We] cause death] وَإِلَيْنَا [and to Us] ٱلْمَصِيرُ [(is) the final return]

data.textUthmani: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
data.wordByWord: يَوْمَ [(The) Day] تَشَقَّقُ [will split] ٱلْأَرْضُ [the earth] عَنْهُمْ [from them] سِرَاعًۭا ۚ [hurrying] ذَٰلِكَ [That] حَشْرٌ [(is) a gathering] عَلَيْنَا [for Us] يَسِيرٌۭ [easy]
data.transliteration: Yawma tashaqqaqu al-ardu AAanhum siraAAanthalika hashrun AAalayna yaseer

data.textUthmani: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
data.wordByWord: نَّحْنُ [We] أَعْلَمُ [know best] بِمَا [[of] what] يَقُولُونَ ۖ [they say] وَمَآ [and not] أَنتَ [(are) you] عَلَيْهِم [over them] بِجَبَّارٍۢ ۖ [the one to compel] فَذَكِّرْ [But remind] بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ [with the Quran] مَن [whoever] يَخَافُ [fears] وَعِيدِ [My threat]
data.transliteration: Nahnu aAAlamu bima yaqooloonawama anta AAalayhim bijabbarin fathakkir bilqur-animan yakhafu waAAeed

data.wordByWord: إِنَّمَا [Indeed, what] تُوعَدُونَ [you are promised] لَصَادِقٌۭ [(is) surely true]
وَإِنَّ [And indeed] ٱلدِّينَ [the Judgment] لَوَٰقِعٌۭ [(is) surely to occur]
